question: Which among the following village was the site of the Vikramshila Mahavihara, the renowned educational centre of Pala period?
explanation: Antichak â€“ Excavated site Vikramshila Vikramashila was founded by Pala King Dharmapala in response to a supposed decline in the quality of scholarship at Nalanda. [It was destroyed by Bakhtiyar Khilji ]
